Just so everybody knows exactly what the base does is this: It looks for th=
e very Spark within a bot, it it matches one in the computers then the bot =
can enter, if it doesn't it will give the bot a warning, and then will shoo=
t.
And the reason I did this is from what Magmatron has been building, if t=
he creature doesn happen to ecsape and get out of Magmatron's control then =
it wouldn't be allowed back into the base.

(If anybody knows anything abou=
t the movie Aliens then they know that they can go very wrong, very fast.)
